DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study evaluate concordance variation systolic pressure index measure toe ankle walk test healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Measurement Systolic Pressure Index Toe After Walking Test
DOC.detailed_description: Our secondary objective : - evaluate concordance left- right-side measure : systolic pressure index measure toe walk test ( healthy volunteer ) - evaluate concordance left- right-side measure : systolic pressure index measure ankle walk test ( healthy volunteer ) - evaluate concordance variation systolic pressure index measure toe ankle recuperation phase walk test ( 5 10 minute end walk test ) healthy volunteer
DOC.criteria: The subject must give his/her inform sign consent The subject must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The subject exclusion period determine previous study The subject judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The subject refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform subject The subject pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The subject contraindication walk test Presence mediacalcose objectify Doppler examination anterior posterior tibial artery , perform test day Known history cardiovascular disease Poorly control diabetes hypertension Neurological , muscular rheumatic pathology contraindicate walk test Acute transient infection ( coldrhinitis , flu , etc . )
